name: Raymond Lirag
text: And again, the convo supports that this is his first time playing zerg ever after playing terran. He heard he'll want to get 6 zergs asap, so he builds pools thinking they're like terran rax. He then clicks on the pools to make zerglings because he doesn't know to click on the larvae instead.    I laugh at stupid things people do all the time, but this looks like someone who's new to the game, not stupid.
